tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ThreatIndicators (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  indicator_type VARCHAR(50),
  indicator_value VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ThreatActor (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  actor_name VARCHAR(100),
  motivation TEXT,
  tactics TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE IncidentReports (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_name VARCHAR(100),
  incident_date DATE,
  description TEXT
)
